results.title: Repurposing Metformin in Nondiabetic People With HIV: Influence on Weight and Gut Microbiota
results.text_hl: Our findings pave the way toward repurposing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to decrease non-@<m>DISEASE_Acquired_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000163 @@@AIDS@@@ comorbidities in ART-treated PWH.

citations.NLM: Isnard S, Lin J, Fombuena B, Ouyang J, Varin TV, Richard C, Marette A, Ramendra R, Planas D, Raymond Marchand L, Messaoudene M, Van der Ley CP, Kema IP, Sohail Ahmed D, Zhang Y, Finkelman M, Routy B, Angel J, Ancuta P, Routy JP. Repurposing Metformin in Nondiabetic People With HIV: Influence on Weight and Gut Microbiota Open Forum Infect Dis. 2020 Sep;7(9):ofaa338. PMID: 32964062
citations.BibTeX: @article{32964062, title={Repurposing Metformin in Nondiabetic People With HIV: Influence on Weight and Gut Microbiota}, author={Isnard S and Lin J and Fombuena B and Ouyang J and Varin TV and Richard C and Marette A and Ramendra R and Planas D and Raymond Marchand L and Messaoudene M and Van der Ley CP and Kema IP and Sohail Ahmed D and Zhang Y and Finkelman M and Routy B and Angel J and Ancuta P and Routy JP}, journal={Open Forum Infect Dis}, volume={7}, number={9}, pages={ofaa338}}

results.title: Metformin effect on gut microbiota: insights for HIV-related inflammation
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may improve gut microbiota composition, in turn reducing @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and risk of non-@<m>DISEASE_Acquired_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000163 @@@AIDS@@@ comorbidities.

citations.NLM: Ouyang J, Isnard S, Lin J, Fombuena B, Marette A, Routy B, Chen Y, Routy JP. Metformin effect on gut microbiota: insights for HIV-related inflammation AIDS Res Ther. 2020 Mar 10;17(1):10. PMID: 32156291
citations.BibTeX: @article{32156291, title={Metformin effect on gut microbiota: insights for HIV-related inflammation}, author={Ouyang J and Isnard S and Lin J and Fombuena B and Marette A and Routy B and Chen Y and Routy JP}, journal={AIDS Res Ther}, volume={17}, number={1}, pages={10}}

results.title: The effect of metformin on body mass index and metabolic parameters in non-diabetic HIV-positive patients: a meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: We performed a comprehensive search through five major indexing databases, using keywords ("@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@" OR "@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@dimethylguanylguanidine@@@" OR "@CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@" OR "@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Glucophage@@@") AND ("@DISEASE_HIV_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV@@@" OR "@SPECIES_12721 @@@human immunodeficiency virus@@@" OR "@<m>DISEASE_Acquired_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000163 @@@AIDS@@@" OR "@<m>DISEASE_Acquired_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000163 @@@Acquired immunodeficiency syndrome@@@"), and all possible combinations until January 15, 2021.

citations.NLM: Harmooshi NN, Abeshtan A, Zakerkish M, Mirmomeni G, Rahim F. The effect of metformin on body mass index and metabolic parameters in non-diabetic HIV-positive patients: a meta-analysis. J Diabetes Metab Disord. 2021 Dec;20(2):1901-1911. PMID: 34900832
citations.BibTeX: @article{34900832, title={The effect of metformin on body mass index and metabolic parameters in non-diabetic HIV-positive patients: a meta-analysis.}, author={Harmooshi NN and Abeshtan A and Zakerkish M and Mirmomeni G and Rahim F}, journal={J Diabetes Metab Disord}, volume={20}, number={2}, pages={1901-1911}}
